displayName: Ensure 'EXECUTE ANY PROCEDURE' Is Revoked from 'OUTLN'
rationale: Migrated `OUTLN` users have more privileges than required.
recommended_action:
To remediate this setting, execute the following SQL statement, keeping in mind if this is granted in both container and pluggable database, you must connect to both places to revoke.
```
REVOKE EXECUTE ANY PROCEDURE FROM OUTLN;
```
error_message: 'EXECUTE ANY PROCEDURE' was found on or more 'OUTLN' users
ruleNames: Ensure 'EXECUTE ANY PROCEDURE' Is Revoked from 'OUTLN'
